::DarkMouse::

She said in a soft sob."I'm fine. It just hurts while some of the 
internal systems come on line fully. That's all." It did hurt a 
little, but her spark hurt worse.  It did have a real pain to it as 
it pumped liquid energon instead of mech fluid. But what hurt more 
was her feeling of She was glad to hear that he was happy and doing 
well here.  But something in the back of her mind wouldn't let the 
question go until it was answered. "Commander, why did you bring me 
back?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> Quickstrike leaned against the frame of the door and crossed his 
> ankles over. He looked out the hallway as he said: "Ah reckon boss-
> bot thinks we're dead. Ah don't wanna think 'bout him fer uh while. 
> Maybe it's best we's play dead. Ah'm startin' t' like it here. No 
> bot's buggin' me. Ah finally got uh quarters t' mahself." He turned 
> his head to her. "If ya are gonna go an' do somethin' crazy like go 
> after ol' boss-bot, ya better have yerself uh plan. Ah tried 
> somethin' an' almost got mahself killed." He chuckled 
lightly. "Dang 
> lucky!" He noticed her entire body was under the pelt he gave 
> her. "Ya okay over there?"
